name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James C. BAKER, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James C. BAKER, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: A. Richard Gerber, Norristown, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 940
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James C. BAKER, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
A. Richard Gerber, Norristown, for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Joseph Hylan, Norristown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
